name: Product Design Template - Double Diamond Process
description:
I am happy to offer you this product design template, which you can use freely for your projects. This template supports the overall design process from start to finish and is based on a classic double diamond model. 


I hope it helps you in your daily work.


If you have any questions, feedback, bugs or incomprehension, feel free to write me!


Have Fun

Philipp


Note:

Every company, agency, team or freelancer works differently. This process is intended as an example and everyone is free to adapt it to their own processes and work flows.


Also, this design process does not cover the complete double or triple diamond of a holistic product discovery process, but is an isolated part that only deals with design steps.


Diamonds in diamonds, so to speak. :)


It's best to consult with your team colleagues (Product Manager, Product Owner, Research or Dev) if this process fits into your overall work flows.
